mapper.select: select * from people where id=${id} and name='${name}'
mapper.update: update people set name = #{name} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(a.num) COUNT, MAX(CASE a.result WHEN '1' THEN a.num ELSE 0 END)good, MAX(CASE a.result WHEN '2' THEN a.num ELSE 0 END)general, MAX(CASE a.result WHEN '3' THEN a.num ELSE 0 END)bad FROM ( SELECT result,COUNT(*) 'num' FROM `shop_satisfaction_result` GROUP BY result ) a

SELECT r.shop_id 'shopId',s.no,s.name 'shopName',r.count,r.good,r.general,r.bad FROM ( SELECT shop_id,SUM(a.num) COUNT, MAX(CASE a.result WHEN '1' THEN a.num ELSE 0 END)good, MAX(CASE a.result WHEN '2' THEN a.num ELSE 0 END)general, MAX(CASE a.result WHEN '3' THEN a.num ELSE 0 END)bad FROM ( SELECT shop_id,result,COUNT(*) 'num' FROM `shop_satisfaction_result` WHERE shop_id IN ( SELECT shop_id FROM `shop_s_satisfaction_shop` ) GROUP BY result,shop_id ORDER BY shop_id ) a GROUP BY a.shop_id ) r LEFT JOIN `oa_department_structure` s ON r.shop_id=s.id;
